name: Bridge does not cross over water or channel protection devices do not exist.
Widespread minor or isolated moderate defects.
Some moderate defects; performance of the channel protection is not affected.
Widespread moderate or isolated major defects; performance of channel protection is affected.
Major defects; performance of channel protection is seriously affected. description typically necessitates more frequent monitoring or corrective actions.
Major defects; channel protection is severely compromised. description typically necessitates more frequent monitoring or corrective actions.
Channel protection has failed, but corrective action could restore it to working description.
Channel protection is beyond repair and must be replaced.
